Reviews.Title: I don't get it
Reviews.Author: T. Klos
Reviews.Content: This is a prepaid phone card. Normally, you would walk into a store, select a card, and pay the face value for it at the register. Why then would anyone pay more than the face value, and then shipping on top of that!?

Reviews.Title: Not As Depicted Severely Over Priced Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: AnonyMissChick18
Reviews.Content: Item is severely overpriced. It also does NOT arrive looking as depicted! I was not pleased at all, and regretted this purchase. Walmart stores and website prices this fair and provides them professionally.

ProductInfo.Name: Verizon $50 ToGo Prepaid Refill Card (mail delivery)
